com.antware.joggerlogger

Class ChartView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.antware.joggerlogger.ChartView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback

    public class ChartView
extends android.view.View
    Class for drawing a line chart in a ChartFragment.
